knimeNode.name: Extract SnpEff
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts a value from a INFO column in a VCF file computed by SnpEFF

fullDescription.intro: Extracts a value from a INFO column in a VCF file computed by SnpEFF and processed with ${SNPEFF}/scripts/vcfEffOnePerLine.pl
fullDescription.option: the INFO column in the VCF

ports.outPort: the VCF and the SnpEff data
